title: Unbreakable Stories: Ian
description: Are you missing Ian and Hollis? Catch more stories with Unbreakable Ian. This is a compilation of short stories following the ups and downs of Ian Pierce and Hollis Banner has they navigate their new relationship and the unique complications of dating with a brunch of overprotective “brothers” determined to guard Ian’s heart. These stories are set after Devour , book 4 of the Unbreakable Bonds series.This compilation is more than 38,000 words and contains short stories such Midnight PerpNo Boyfriends AllowedA Night OffTaking It SlowThis is UsAnd a very special bonus. Fall in love with Ian and Hollis all over again.
author: Jocelynn Drake
